hero.title: Hello, I am
hero.subtitle: FRONTEND SOFTWARE DEVELOPER
hero.paragraph: With a passion for frontend development, I create user-friendly applications and look forward to working with a motivated team.

section1.subtitle: A Few Words About Me
section1.paragraph1: I am Kenan Ä†urevac, a 27-year-old engineer with a Bachelor's degree in Traffic Engineering from the University of Sarajevo, where I also live. The German language and culture have been part of my life since childhood, which is reflected in my fluent German skills - I grew up watching German television!
section1.paragraph2: I gained one and a half years of experience in the field of quality assurance (QA). This time helped me develop a strong understanding of reliability and teamwork. I also have a strong affinity for mathematics. Even in school, I took part in math competitions and discovered my enjoyment of analytical thinking.
section1.paragraph3: I place great importance on detail-oriented work and consider myself a solution-oriented team player. I am motivated to continuously develop myself and to keep learning and growing throughout my professional life. Let's get to know each other - feel free to take a look at my projects. I look forward to hearing from you!

section1.subtitle: Studies
section1.paragraph: I hold a Bachelor's degree in Traffic Engineering from the University of Sarajevo, Bosnia and Herzegovina, with a focus on road traffic.

section2.subtitle: Languages
section2.paragraph: I hold a C1 certificate in German from the Goethe-Institut. In addition, I speak fluent English at a C1 level.

section1.subtitle: QA at Bloola GmbH
section1.paragraph: As a QA at the German company Bloola GmbH, I was responsible for conducting manual tests of a web app. Both communication with international colleagues and test documentation were conducted in English.

section2.subtitle: Position as a Call Agent
section2.paragraph: As a Call Agent in a call center, I was able to significantly develop my skills in communication, empathy, and sales. I was responsible for supporting and advising German customers as well as closing contracts for electricity, gas, internet, and telephone services.

section1.paragraph1: Quiz App is an interactive quiz application consisting of 10 questions, each with four answer options. After answering all the questions, the user receives an evaluation of their responses.
section1.paragraph2: Technologies: React, TypeScript, Redux Toolkit, Material UI, The Trivia API

section2.paragraph1: Film Atlas is a comprehensive film database that allows users to search for movies, TV series, and people working in the film and television industry, and to access detailed information about them.
section2.paragraph2: The database not only lists current theatrical releases and popular series, but also provides a preview of upcoming movies (with trailers) and shows, as well as an overview of TV series currently airing. The offering is rounded out by top lists of the highest-rated productions.
section2.paragraph3: Technologien: React, TypeScript, SCSS, Material UI, The Movie Database API
